mapper.insert: insert into slip (slipnumber, total, slipdate, departmentname, jukyo, status) values (client_seq.nextval,#{total},sysdate,#{departmentName},#{jukyo},#{status})
mapper.select: select slipnumber, total, slipdate, departmentname, jukyo, status from slip order by slipnumber desc
select slipnumber, total, slipdate, departmentname, jukyo, status from slip where slipnumber = #{slipNumber}
select * from (select a.*, rownum rn from (select slip.* from slip order by slipNumber) a ) a where rn between (#{page}-1)*#{pageSize}+1 and #{page}*#{pageSize}

select slipnumber, total, slipdate, departmentName, jukyo, status as all_slip from slip where to_date(slipDate,'yy/mm/dd') between to_date(#{pre_date},'yy/mm/dd') and to_date(#{post_date},'yy/mm/dd') and departmentname = '인사'
